statements: SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, title FROM research_papers WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, title, author FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS paper_count FROM research_papers GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY paper_count DESC
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE author LIKE 'Jane%' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM research_papers ORDER BY author
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE year_published > 2010;
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM research_papers ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT title, author, year_published FROM research_papers WHERE year_published BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020;
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE title LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT author, title FROM research_papers WHERE year_published > 2010;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM research_papers ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers ORDER BY year_published DESC, title ASC;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE paper_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ResearchPapers;
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM Books ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title AS BookTitle, author AS Author FROM Books WHERE author <> 'Anonymous';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers;
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM Books WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, author AS writer, publication_date FROM Books WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT r.title AS research_title, b.title AS book_title FROM ResearchPapers r JOIN Citations c ON r.id = c.research_paper_id JOIN Books b ON b.id = c.book_id;
SELECT * FROM Papers;
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT id, title, author, published_date FROM Papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, author FROM Books ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT Papers.title, Authors.name AS author_name, Books.title AS book_title FROM Papers INNER JOIN Authors ON Papers.author = Authors.name INNER JOIN Books ON Papers.title = Books.title;
SELECT * FROM Papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, published_date FROM Books WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Papers.title, Authors.name FROM Papers JOIN Authors ON Papers.author = Authors.name WHERE Papers.published_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT Papers.title, Books.title AS book_title FROM Papers JOIN Books ON Papers.author = Books.author WHERE Papers.published_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT Papers.title, Citations.citation_date FROM Papers JOIN Citations ON Papers.id = Citations.paper_id WHERE Citations.citation_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Citations.citation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE publish_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT author, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books WHERE title LIKE '%Database%';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT rp.title, rp.author, c.citation_date FROM research_papers rp INNER JOIN citations c ON rp.paper_id = c.paper_id;
SELECT rp.title AS paper_title, a.author_name AS cited_by FROM research_papers rp INNER JOIN citations c ON rp.paper_id = c.cited_paper_id INNER JOIN authors a ON c.paper_id = a.author_id;
